title: Getting a flu shot while hospitalized lowers the chance of a heart attack

title_detail.value: Getting a flu shot while hospitalized lowers the chance of a heart attack

summary: There's now another reason to get your yearly flu shot. Not only can it protect you from the body aches, fever and fatigue associated with a bout of influenza, it may even prevent you from having a heart attack.
